ExampleDefinition.Description:
This 3D Chart demo shows how to control the light direction on the SciChart3DSurface using [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Viewport3D.htmlViewport3D']Viewport3D[/url] methods.
The Viewport3D is attached to the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.ISciChart3DRenderSurface~Viewport3D.html']SciChart3DSurface.Viewport3D[/url] property and may be used to customize the presentation of the 3D Scene.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
Use the toolbar on the left to switch between main light modes. You can also change X,Y,Z light direction properties to see how the viewport of the 3D Chart changes.
